messenger release 1.8.4

v1.8.4
- Add attachment thumbnails to messages.
- Add open source licenses.
- Made logout actions consistent.
- Client-side migration to registration scheme using signed
registration ids.
- Fixed false updates of messages as sent for Gingerbread.
- Multiple bug fixes.

correcting back stack issues

singleTask not singleTop in HomeActivity).

title: safeslinger 1.7.2 release
message:
safeslinger 1.7.2 release

- Added internal Language change setting in the Settings menu and Setup
screen.
- Added ability to Edit a linked contact's name and photo by
long-pressing on a contact name.
- Updated linked contact name and photo when address book is updated.
- Stability fixes.

title: safeslinger release 1.7.1
message:
safeslinger release 1.7.1

- Simplified setup by adding passphrase creation to setup screen.
- Moved Secure Introduction to tabs.
- Changed default tab to be Messages list.
- Added easy access to license and privacy policy.
- Stability fixes.

title: safeslinger release 1.7.0.1
message:
safeslinger release 1.7.0.1

- Opened Secure Introduction to all introduced keys as well as all
exchanged keys.
- Added retry back-off for message notices received under poor network
conditions.
- Removed secondary dependency on address book when importing exchanges
and introductions.
- Stability fixes.

title: safeslinger release 1.7.0
message:
safeslinger release 1.7.0

- Added backward-compatible support for future push notification
systems and devices.
- Fixed issue when attaching non-ASCII file names and contact names.
- Added selected word phrase to progress UI.
- Performance improvements.
- Stability fixes.

title: safeslinger release 1.6.13
message:
safeslinger release 1.6.13

- Added Forgot Passphrase? feature to generate new key.
- Added Add Contact Invitation feature to select a contact to send
Sling Keys instructions to.
- Added easy access logout from the passphrase cached notification.
- Added automatic logout when airplane mode is turned on.
- Two-user key exchanges will now pre-select the imported key to draft
a new message.
- Improved accuracy of passphrase timeout when idle.
- Corrected several issues causing sent messages to delay or duplicate
themselves.
- Stability fixes.

title: Update README.md

title: safeslinger release 1.6.12
message:
safeslinger release 1.6.12

- Separated source for developers into easy exchange library and demo
for any Android application to use (github.com/SafeSlingerProject).
- Improved exchange UI to display better icons and selected values.
- Added setting to customize message notification: sounds, vibration.
- Added setting to change message font size (default is slightly
larger).
- Added setting to auto-decrypt messages (default to true).
- Fixed loss of selected attachment on Compose tab.
- Restored Sling Keys Assistant on Sling Keys tab.
- Replaced ActionBarSherlock library with appcompat-v7 library.
- Stability fixes.

NOTE: This commit replaces an earlier one yesterday with notes removed
that included user comments emailed to us. Since we did not have
permission to publish those comments, we’ve since removed those 2 files
of notes to respect our users privacy.

- Expanded options for choosing a personal contact from the address
book, including local Profile.
- Made Sling Keys navigation consistent with other tabs.
- Stability fixes.
